metadata.title: CVE-2023-46045 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Graphviz 2.36 before 10.0.0 has an out-of-bounds read via a craftedconfig6a file. NOTE: exploitability may be uncommon because this file istypically owned by root.

criterions.comment: graphviz package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
